mapper.select: SELECT channel, title, price, seller, buyer, rdate, udate, seller_nik, buyer_nik, last_content, buyer_profile, seller_profile, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_SUB WHERE CHAT_SUB.STATUS = 'N' AND CHAT_SUB.CHANNEL = CHAT.CHANNEL AND CHAT_SUB.RECEIVER = #{buyer}) STATUS FROM CHAT WHERE buyer=#{buyer} or seller=#{seller} ORDER BY UDATE DESC
SELECT channel, receiver, sender, content, status, rdate FROM CHAT_SUB WHERE channel=#{channel}
SELECT channel, pro_code, title, price, seller, buyer FROM CHAT WHERE channel=#{channel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_SUB ( CHANNEL, RECEIVER, SENDER, CONTENT, RDATE ) VALUES ( #{channel}, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT SET LAST_CONTENT = #{content}, UDATE = sysdate WHERE CHANNEL = #{channel}
mapper.select: SELECT PROFILE_IMG SELLER_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{seller}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode} AND SELLER = #{seller} AND BUYER = #{buyer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHANNEL, TITLE, PRICE, SELLER, BUYER, RDATE, SELLER_NIK, BUYER_NIK, BUYER_PROFILE, SELLER_PROFILE, PRO_CODE ) VALUES (CHAT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{price}, #{seller}, #{buyer}, SYSDATE, #{sellerNik}, #{buyerNik}, #{buyerProfile}, #{sellerProfile}, #{proCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT CHANNEL FROM CHAT WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode} AND SELLER = #{seller} AND BUYER = #{buyer}
